 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָתַם‎</span> **verb** ==stop up, shut up, keep close== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְתַם‎</span> ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> very rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***close*** door [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1334, and</sup> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Kam|Kam]] [[BDB#Frey|Frey]], are perhaps loan-words); **\*\***compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***bit sutummu***</u></abbr>, ***storehouse***, ***treasury***, Zehnpf<sup>BAS i. 531</sup>. — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[2Chr.32.30|2Chr 32:30]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְתֹּ֑מוּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.3.19|2Kgs 3:19]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְתֹּ֑מוּ‎</span> v[[2Kgs.3.25|2Kgs 3:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסְתְּמוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.32.4|2Chr 32:4]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְתֹם‎</span> [[Dan.8.26|Dan 8:26]]; [[Dan.12.4|Dan 12:4]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְתּוֺם‎</span> [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]] ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָתוּם‎</span> [[Ezek.28.3|Ezek 28:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָתֻם‎</span> [[Ps.51.8|Ps 51:8]], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְתֻמִים‎</span> [[Dan.12.9|Dan 12:9]] — 

**1.** ***stop up*** springs of water [[2Kgs.3.19|2Kgs 3:19]]; [[2Kgs.3.25|2Kgs 3:25]]; [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]]; [[2Chr.32.4|2Chr 32:4]], compare v[[2Chr.32.30|2Chr 32:30]]. 

**2.** ***shut up, keep close***, prophetic words [[Dan.8.26|Dan 8:26]]; [[Dan.12.4|Dan 12:4]]; [[Dan.12.9|Dan 12:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּסָתֻם‎</span> [[Ps.51.8|Ps 51:8]] ***in*** (the) ***closed*** (chamber of the breast; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טֻחוֺת‎</span>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלסָֿתוּם‎</span> [[Ezek.28.3|Ezek 28:3]] usually no ***secret*** is too dark for thee, but doubtful (see  II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמם‎</span>); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">σοφοί</span>, [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַרְטֻמִּים‎</span> &lt; Toy <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲכָמִים‎</span>, or [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹסְמִים‎</span>. **Niph\`al** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִסָּתֵם‎</span> [[Neh.4.1|Neh 4:1]] the breaches [in the walls] had begun ***to be stopped up***. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִתְּמוּם‎</span> [[Gen.26.16|Gen 26:16]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְסַתְּמוּם‎</span> v[[Gen.26.18|Gen 26:18]], both of ***stopping*** wells ***quite up*** ([[BDB#R|R]]<sup>JE</sup>). 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂתַם‎</span> **verb** usually ==stop up==, in sense of ***shut out***, shut ears against (late \|\| form of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָתַם‎</span>; yet awkward; [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 9</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***frustrate, disappoint***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּפִלָּתִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Lam.3.8|Lam 3:8]] (&gt; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂתָם‎</span>) ***he*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***hath shut out my prayer*** ([[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מתּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> ***shut up*** [himself] ***from***).
